issue.title: com.microsoft.teams
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.microsoft.teams

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, EasyPrivacy, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||mobile.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass

||browser.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.teams

||teams.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.teams

||ic3.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.teams


everything in app works fine with these

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

since we dont block events.data.microsoft.com in the dns list i suggest we start blocking for individual apps. blocking events.data.microsoft.com for apps is ok the only issue we had was with xbox and that was dns. so app basis is fine.

suggested filters:
|browser.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass
||self.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass
||mobile.events.data.microsoft.com^$app=com.microsoft.xboxone.smartglass

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: i have all these blocked and everything works fine om the app

issue.title: wired.jp
issue.body:
